fields.name: AggregatorOrSingleRackDefinition
fields.description: The rack definition that is intended to reflect only a single rack in a single rack cluster, or an aggregator rack in a multi-rack cluster.

fields.name: ClusterLocation
fields.description: The customer-provided location information to identify where the cluster resides.

fields.name: ClusterServicePrincipal
fields.description: The service principal to be used by the cluster during Arc Appliance installation.

fields.name: ComputeDeploymentThreshold
fields.description: The validation threshold indicating the allowable failures of compute machines during environment validation and deployment.

fields.name: ComputeRackDefinitions
fields.description:
The list of rack definitions for the compute racks in a multi-rack
cluster, or an empty list in a single-rack cluster.
